columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: AgentUpdatedVersion
columns.description: The version of the agent that was updated.

columns.name: UserId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the user.

columns.name: ThreatId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the threat.

columns.name: PrimaryDescription
columns.description: The primary description of the event.

columns.name: SecondaryDescription
columns.description: The secondary description of the event.

columns.name: Id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the record.

columns.name: GroupId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the group.

columns.name: CreatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the record was created.

columns.name: AccountName
columns.description: The name of the account associated with the event.

columns.name: Data
columns.description: Activity metadata.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the agent.

columns.name: Hash
columns.description: The hash associated with the event.

columns.name: UpdatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) when the record was last updated.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: The description of the event.

columns.name: ActivityUuid
columns.description: The UUID of the activity associated with the event.

columns.name: SiteId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the site.

columns.name: ActivityType
columns.description: The type of activity represented by an integer.

columns.name: SiteName
columns.description: The name of the site associated with the event.

columns.name: AccountId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account.

columns.name: OsFamily
columns.description: The operating system family, such as macOS.

columns.name: GroupName
columns.description: The name of the group associated with the event.

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Any comments associated with the event.
